name: Find The Button (syy1125, artlessAvian, dshdd)
description:
Find The Button (syy1125, artlessAvian, dshdd) is a puzzle game developed by artlessAvian, syy1125 and dshdd. It came out on 20-10-2019.
You can play Find The Button (syy1125, artlessAvian, dshdd) on PC, macOS, Linux and Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
